title: May I Kill You, Your Majesty? - Novel Updates
tags: Adopted Children   Aristocracy   Child Abuse   Female Protagonist   Nobles   Poor Protagonist   Reincarnation   Royalty
author: Baek Yi Dam   백이들
description:
She died because of the prince, and it’s her fourth return.

I can’t die again.

The prince…

Let’s seduce him!

***

“Tell me again. What we talked about back then.”

The blood stained Castian looked at Earendel and said,

“I like you. I’m serious. You said that, didn’t you?” Earendel finally realized.

“So if I save your life, tell me you’ll be with me for the rest of your life.”

That something has been twisted.>
